data.title: Deborah Meaden Net Worth, Salary and Businesses
data.meta_description: Deborah Meaden’s net worth is estimated to be £55 Million ($70 million). Deborah Meaden's salary is reported to be around £15,000 per season.
data.text:
British businesswoman, Deborah Meaden has a net worth estimated at $70 million. Deborah Meaden is a very famous and successful woman from England who is known all over the world for her amazing journey so far. She is one of the most successful businesswomen and a very successful television personality. She is known for her multi-million-pound hotel business which has given her a lot of wealth and property.

Deborah started her journey piecemeal and currently, she is one of the most successful women in England. She started working as a sales room model and later at the age of 19, she moved to Italy where she set up a glass and ceramic export company. The company failed after 18 months and later she returned to England. Later she started a few other businesses and gained moderate success.

In 1988, she joined her family business and became a part of it working very well. In 1999, she led a management buyout and later acquired a majority of the company’s shares. She sold the company six years later in 2005, although by then it was one of the leading hotel chains. Meaden has also appeared on several other television shows and radio programs. What is Deborah Meaden’s Net Worth and Salary?

British businesswoman, Deborah Meaden’s net worth is estimated to be £55 Million ($70 million) as of 2024. Deborah Meaden’s salary is reported to be around £15,000 per season specifically for her work on Dragons’ Den. Deborah Meaden is a very famous and successful woman from England who is known worldwide for her amazing work as a businesswoman and her achievements in television and radio. She has earned millions of pounds from her business, and she has also appeared in a lot of television shows.

Deborah has also appeared as a contestant on several shows. She has a very good net worth, which is currently over $70 million. Most of her wealth came from her family business of hotels, which ended up giving her such wealth.

Deborah Meaden House and Cars

Deborah Meaden is a very famous name in England, whose career is a treat for everyone. She has done exceptional work in her career and is very famous for her business mind and her attentive nature. She is a very efficient woman. She currently lives in Somerset, where she has a very beautiful mansion, and she is spending her time with her family.

Deborah Meaden has a very beautiful collection of cars, as she is very rich and she drives in a very stylish way. She has Audi, Aston Martin, BMW and some more luxurious cars.

Deborah Meaden Biography

Deborah Sonia Meaden was born in Taunton, Somerset, England, on 11 February 1959. She grew up in Taunton for a very short time, as her parents got divorced when she was very young. After her parents got divorced, she moved to Essex with her mother and her elder sister. When she was seven years old, her mother married a man named Brian Meaden, who later became Meaden’s true father, and since then she has spent most of her time in Essex with her family.

Meaden was never interested in schooling and education from the very beginning. She left her school at the age of 16, and later she went into business. Deborah Meaden is currently married to Paul Farmer since 1993, and they have been living a very happy and successful life for a very long time. They have been together as a couple for the past three decades. However, she met him during her college days in 1985. They do not have any children yet. Must Read Peter Jones Net Worth.

Deborah Meaden Relationship and More

Businesses Career and Awards

Deborah Meaden began her career way back in the late 70s when she also joined Brighton Technical College, where she studied business management. She started working as a sales room model in a fashion house. She moved to Italy after completing her graduation, and there she set up a business, of glass and ceramics export agency. Her business failed in the next 18 months, and later she moved back to England.

She along with her partner bought one of the first stefanel textile franchises in the UK, which made her the subject of limelight. She sold it after two years, and later she did several other ventures. In 1988, she joined her family business of amusement arcade operations. She joined Weststar Holidays in 1992, where she worked for a while.

In 1999, she acquired most of the shares of the business, by leading a management buyout. Later, in the next six years, most of the company’s shares were sold, and she soon liquidated her share of $23%. She earned £19 million from that deal. In 2009, she acquired Fox Brothers, a textile mill. As far as her television works are concerned, she is hugely famous for working in Dragons’ Den on BBC.

She has appeared in Strictly Come Dancing, as a contestant. She has worked in dozens of other shows and has also worked in radio, as well as written and published a book. She has received several honorary degrees from various universities, which include the University of Exeter, Stratfordshire University, Keele University, etc. Also, Check Jack Ma’s Net Worth.

Education

Deborah Meaden did her early schooling at Godolphin School. She later moved to Trowbridge High School for Girls, which she left at the age of 16. She went to Brighton Technical College, where she completed her studies, graduating at the age of 19.

Conclusion

Deborah Meaden is a phenomenal businesswoman and a television personality. She has done an exceptional job in her long and illustrious career and has achieved massive success and fame. Deborah has earned millions worth of fortune from her business tactics, and her critical analysis. She has also featured in numerous television shows, and she has done very well in there.
